amendment.description: An amendment numbered 18 printed in House Report 116-289 to require the United States Export Finance Agency to emphasize outreach to small businesses in sectors that have been impacted by retaliatory tariffs.
amendment.purpose: Amendment requires the United States Export Finance Agency to emphasize outreach to small businesses in sectors that have been impacted by retaliatory tariffs.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Stevens amendment (A018) Agreed to by recorded vote: 396 - 27 (Roll no. 621).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A018) offered by Ms. Stevens.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Stevens amendment (A018) Agreed to by recorded vote: 396 - 27 (Roll no. 621).
